Headline: #115 Pullman/115th Temporary Reroute at 115th/Wentworth
ShortDescription: 115 Pullman/115th buses are temporarily rerouted via 115th, Halsted, 111th, State, and 115th due to, street blockage near 115th/Wentworth.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#115 Pullman/115th buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via 115th, Halsted, 111th, State, and 115th due to, street blockage near 115th/Wentworth.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #71 71st/South ShoreTemporary Eastbound Reroute near 71st/East End
ShortDescription: EB 71 71st/South Shore buses are temporarily rerouted via 71st, Stony Island, 73rd, Jeffrey and 71st due to street blockage near 71st/East End.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Eastbound #71 71st/South Shore buses are temporarily rerouted via 71st, Stony Island, 73rd, Jeffrey and 71st due to street blockage near 71st/East End.

Westbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.
